circle.desc:
scene=MiningRegion x=-947.04 y=255.40 z=-571.05 The cave provides a warmth bonus, and is a good source of Coal. There is no other loot present. The cave is home to a Bear, caution is advised when exploring the cave. (DANGER!) Poisoned Wolves often patrol the area.
Miner's Footpath is to the north, while Desperate Elevation is to the south. Craggy Passage is even farther to the south.
circle.title: Smoker's cave provides a warmth bonus and is a good source of Coal. The cave is home to a Bear so caution is advised when exploring the cave. Poisoned Wolves often patrol the area. (DANGER!)
